external_references.description: Lior Rochberger, Tom Fakterman, Robert Falcone. (2023, September 22). Cyberespionage Attacks Against Southeast Asian Government Linked to Stately Taurus, Aka Mustang Panda. Retrieved September 9, 2025.

objects.description: [TONESHELL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1239) has facilitated inter-process communication between DLL components via the use of pipes.(Citation: Palo Alto Unit42 STATELY TAURUS TONESHELL September 2023) [TONESHELL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1239) has also created a reverse shell using two anonymous pipes to write data to stdin and read data from stdout and stderr.(Citation: 2025_IBM_PUBLOAD_TONESHELL_HIUPAN_CLAIMLOADER_MUSTANG PANDA)
